guide.title: Gentoo-portage: Gentoo's Package Management System
guide.subtitle: Main Page
guide.abstract: Gentoo-portage is the project encompassing the primary support and deployment systems for Gentoo Linux.

body.p: Gentoo-portage is a top-level project that manages the efforts of developing, maintaining, and incorporating contributions into the package management system that binds together the efforts of the Gentoo Linux distribution.

The current developing sub-projects in Gentoo-portage are:
Sub-project: Description:
Portage Stable
Subsection of the main project focusing on the essential operations of Portage and maintaining the stable functionality for everyday use.
Portage Development
Subsection of the main project focusing on the advancement of Portage to enhance the feature set and capabilities.
Portage Documentation
An effort to provide complete, actively maintained documentation for every part of Portage and the underlying system.
